title: Bank of Khyber’s profit shoots to Rs3.5bn, 665% higher YoY in 2023
summary: Consequently the net markup of the bank reached Rs13.89 billion in 2023 as compared to Rs7.15 billion in 2022 a significant increase of over 94. However despite the loss BoKs total income jumped to Rs16 billion in 2023 an increase of 88.

title: Bank of Khyber to set up exchange company with Rs1bn initial capital
summary: Read This Big banks are all set to run the open market. The SBP issued noobjection certificate NOC to ABL and MCB for establishing their exchange companies.

title: Bank of Khyber says will establish wholly-owned EC
summary: The State Bank of Pakistan SBP in line with its regulatory directives has encouraged banks to establish currency exchange companies to facilitate and improve the currency exchange and related financial services through formal banking channels read the notice. As per the banks latest financial results BoK announced a profit before tax of Rs 4682 million for 9MCY23.

title: Bank of Khyber reports stellar profit surge in 2023, declares dividend & bonus shares - Mettis Link News
summary: Bank of Khyber reports stellar profit surge in 2023 declares dividend  bonus shares  Mettis Link News
